trans-unit.source: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> with the associated SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: Gera automaticamente os comandos de tabela única que são utilizados para reconciliar as alterações efetuadas a um <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> a base de dados do SQL Server associados.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> does not automatically generate the Transact-SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> with the associated instance of SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>não gerar automaticamente as instruções Transact-SQL necessárias para reconciliar as alterações efetuadas a um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>com a instância do SQL Server associada.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: However, you can create a SqlCommandBuilder object to automatically generate Transact-SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, pode criar um objeto de SqlCommandBuilder para gerar automaticamente instruções Transact-SQL para atualizações de tabela única se definir a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, any additional Transact-SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the SqlCommandBuilder.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, quaisquer instruções Transact-SQL adicionais que não definidas foram geradas pelo SqlCommandBuilder.

trans-unit.source: The SqlCommandBuilder registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events whenever you set the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O SqlCommandBuilder regista-se automaticamente como um serviço de escuta para <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos sempre que definiu o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating>

trans-unit.source: You can only associate one <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> or SqlCommandBuilder object with each other at one time.
trans-unit.target: Só pode associar um <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>ou SqlCommandBuilder objeto entre si de uma só vez.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the SqlCommandBuilder uses the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to retrieve a required set of metadata automatically.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar instruções INSERT, UPDATE ou DELETE, utiliza o SqlCommandBuilder o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade obter automaticamente um conjunto de metadados necessário.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> after the metadata has been retrieved, such as after the first update, you should call the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> method to update the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Se alterar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>depois dos metadados de obtenção, tal como após a primeira atualização, deve chamar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>método para atualizar os metadados.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `SelectCommand` must also return at least one primary key or unique column.
trans-unit.target: O `SelectCommand` também tem de devolver pelo menos uma chave primária ou uma coluna exclusiva.

trans-unit.source: If none are present, an **InvalidOperation** exception is generated, and the commands are not generated.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum estiverem presentes, um **InvalidOperation** exceção é gerada e os comandos não são gerados.

trans-unit.source: The SqlCommandBuilder also uses the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Transaction%2A> properties referenced by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O SqlCommandBuilder também utiliza o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>e <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Transaction%2A>Propriedades referenciada pelo <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Transaction%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user should call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if one or more of these properties are modified, or if the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> itself is replaced.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador deve chamar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se um ou mais destas propriedades forem modificados, ou se o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>em si é substituído.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> properties retain their previous values.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>Propriedades manter os respetivos valores anteriores.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, the SqlCommandBuilder is disassociated from the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>, and the generated commands are no longer used.
trans-unit.target: Se chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, o SqlCommandBuilder é desassociar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>, e os comandos gerados já não são utilizados.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"></xref> class with the associated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe associada com <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>regista-se automaticamente como um serviço de escuta para <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>especificadas nesta propriedade.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria uma nova instância do <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>associada a este <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>é libertado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> for an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Define ou obtém o <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"> </xref> para uma instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets a string used as the catalog separator for an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Define ou obtém uma cadeia utilizada como o separador de catálogo para uma instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the catalog separator for use with an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que indica o separador de catálogo para utilização com uma instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref> object for which Transact-SQL statements are automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto para o qual Transact-SQL instruções são geradas automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>regista-se automaticamente como um serviço de escuta para <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>especificadas nesta propriedade.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria uma nova instância do <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>associada a este <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>é libertado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> and populates the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Parameters*> collection of the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém informações de parâmetro do procedimento armazenado especificado no <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> e preenche o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Parameters*>coleção de especificado <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: `DeriveParameters` overwrites any existing parameter information for the `SqlDbCommand`.
trans-unit.target: `DeriveParameters`substitui quaisquer informações de parâmetro existente para o `SqlDbCommand`.

trans-unit.source: `DeriveParameters` requires an additional call to the database to obtain the information.
trans-unit.target: `DeriveParameters`necessita de uma chamada adicional para a base de dados para obter as informações.

trans-unit.source: If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Se as informações do parâmetro são conhecidas seguinte com antecedência, é mais eficiente para preencher a coleção de parâmetros ao definir explicitamente as informações.

trans-unit.source: You can only use `DeriveParameters` with stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: Só pode utilizar `DeriveParameters` com procedimentos armazenados.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use `DeriveParameters` with extended stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível utilizar `DeriveParameters` com procedimentos armazenados expandidos.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use `DeriveParameters` to populate the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection> with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível utilizar `DeriveParameters` para preencher o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection>com instruções Transact-SQL arbitrários, como uma instrução SELECT parametrizada.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [configurar parâmetros e tipos de dados de parâmetro](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> referenciar o procedimento armazenado a partir da qual as informações do parâmetro são derivada.

trans-unit.source: The derived parameters are added to the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Parameters*> collection of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros derivados são adicionados para o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Parameters*>coleção do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: The command text is not a valid stored procedure name.
trans-unit.target: O texto do comando não é um nome de procedimento armazenado válido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar eliminações na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetDeleteCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Uma aplicação pode utilizar o método de GetDeleteCommand para fins de resolução de problemas ou informativas porque devolve o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto para ser executada.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetDeleteCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar GetDeleteCommand como a base de um comando de modificação.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetDeleteCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar GetDeleteCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, de definir explicitamente que no <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois da instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, a aplicação tem de chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se alterar a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetDeleteCommand will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o GetDeleteCommand ainda utilizará as informações da instrução anterior, o que poderá não estar correta.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetDeleteCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL primeiro são geradas quando a aplicação chama um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetDeleteCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar as eliminações.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object that is required to perform deletions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objeto que é necessário para efetuar eliminações na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Uma aplicação pode utilizar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>método para resolução de problemas ou informativa fins porque devolve o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto para ser executada.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>como base de um comando de modificação.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>e modificar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, de definir explicitamente que no <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois da instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, a aplicação tem de chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se alterar a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>ainda irá utilizar as informações da instrução anterior, o que poderá não estar correta.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL primeiro são geradas quando a aplicação chama um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento predefinido, ao gerar nomes de parâmetros, consiste em utilizar @p1, @p2, e assim sucessivamente para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Transmitir `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite forçar o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>para gerar os parâmetros com base nos nomes de colunas em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isto é concluída com êxito apenas se as seguintes condições são cumpridas: - <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>devolvidos pelo **GetSchema** chamada de método e encontrado no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>coleção foi especificada e o comprimento é igual ou maior do que o nome do parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome do parâmetro gerado cumpre os critérios especificados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>devolvidos pelo **GetSchema** método chamada e encontrados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>expressão regular da coleção.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>devolveu o **GetSchema** chamada de método e encontrado no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>coleção é especificada.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, gerar nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de coluna se possível.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, gerar @p1, @p2, e assim sucessivamente.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object that is required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objeto que é necessário para efetuar as eliminações.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar inserções na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetInsertCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Uma aplicação pode utilizar o método de GetInsertCommand para fins de resolução de problemas ou informativas porque devolve o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto para ser executada.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetInsertCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar GetInsertCommand como a base de um comando de modificação.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetInsertCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar GetInsertCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, de definir explicitamente que no <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois da instrução de Transact-SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, a aplicação tem de chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se alterar a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetInsertCommand will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o GetInsertCommand ainda utilizará as informações da instrução anterior, o que poderá não estar correta.

trans-unit.source: The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetInsertCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções Transact-SQL, primeiro são geradas quando a aplicação chama um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetInsertCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> necessário para efetuar inserções de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object that is required to perform insertions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objeto que é necessário para efetuar inserções na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Uma aplicação pode utilizar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>método para resolução de problemas ou informativa fins porque devolve o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto para ser executada.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>como base de um comando de modificação.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>e modificar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, de definir explicitamente que no <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois da instrução de Transact-SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, a aplicação tem de chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se alterar a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>ainda irá utilizar as informações da instrução anterior, o que poderá não estar correta.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções Transact-SQL, primeiro são geradas quando a aplicação chama um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento predefinido, ao gerar nomes de parâmetros, consiste em utilizar @p1, @p2, e assim sucessivamente para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Transmitir `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite forçar o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>para gerar os parâmetros com base nos nomes de colunas em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isto é concluída com êxito apenas se as seguintes condições são cumpridas: - <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>devolvidos pelo **GetSchema** chamada de método e encontrado no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>coleção foi especificada e o comprimento é igual ou maior do que o nome do parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome do parâmetro gerado cumpre os critérios especificados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>devolvidos pelo **GetSchema** método chamada e encontrados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>expressão regular da coleção.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>devolveu o **GetSchema** chamada de método e encontrado no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>coleção é especificada.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, gerar nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de coluna se possível.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, gerar @p1, @p2, e assim sucessivamente.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object that is required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objeto que é necessário para efetuar inserções.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar atualizações na base de dados.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetUpdateCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Uma aplicação pode utilizar o método de GetUpdateCommand para fins de resolução de problemas ou informativas porque devolve o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto para ser executada.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetUpdateCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar GetUpdateCommand como a base de um comando de modificação.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetUpdateCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar GetUpdateCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, de definir explicitamente que no <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois da instrução de Transact-SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, a aplicação tem de chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se alterar a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetUpdateCommand will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o GetUpdateCommand ainda utilizará as informações da instrução anterior, o que poderá não estar correta.

trans-unit.source: The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetUpdateCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções Transact-SQL, primeiro são geradas quando a aplicação chama um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetUpdateCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento predefinido, ao gerar nomes de parâmetros, consiste em utilizar @p1, @p2, e assim sucessivamente para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Transmitir `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite forçar o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>para gerar os parâmetros com base nos nomes de colunas em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isto é concluída com êxito apenas se as seguintes condições são cumpridas: - <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>devolvidos pelo **GetSchema** chamada de método e encontrado no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>coleção foi especificada e o comprimento é igual ou maior do que o nome do parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome do parâmetro gerado cumpre os critérios especificados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>devolvidos pelo **GetSchema** método chamada e encontrados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>expressão regular da coleção.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>devolveu o **GetSchema** chamada de método e encontrado no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>coleção é especificada.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, gerar nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de coluna se possível.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, gerar @p1, @p2, e assim sucessivamente.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para efetuar atualizações.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador unquoted no caso de catálogo correto, devolve o correto entre aspas formulário esse identificador.

trans-unit.source: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Isto inclui corretamente escape qualquer aspas no identificador de incorporados.

trans-unit.source: The original unquoted identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador unquoted original.

trans-unit.source: The quoted version of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: A versão delimitada por aspas do identificador.

trans-unit.source: Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.
trans-unit.target: Incorporados aspas dentro do identificador estão corretamente caráter de escape correto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting character or characters to use when specifying SQL Server database objects, such as tables or columns, whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caráter inicial ou carateres da utilizar ao especificar os objetos de base de dados do SQL Server, como tabelas ou colunas, cujos nomes contêm carateres como espaços ou tokens reservados.

trans-unit.source: The starting character or characters to use.
trans-unit.target: O caráter inicial ou carateres da utilizar.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma cadeia vazia.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be changed after an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE command has been generated.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não pode ser alterada depois de uma INSERT, UPDATE, ou foi gerado comando DELETE.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ending character or characters to use when specifying SQL Server database objects, such as tables or columns, whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caráter ou carateres da utilizar ao especificar os objetos de base de dados do SQL Server, como tabelas ou colunas, cujos nomes contêm carateres como espaços ou tokens reservados final.

trans-unit.source: The ending character or characters to use.
trans-unit.target: O caráter final ou o carateres para utilizar.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma cadeia vazia.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be changed after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não pode ser alterada depois de um insert, update ou o comando delete foi gerado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character to be used for the separator between the schema identifier and any other identifiers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o carácter a ser utilizado para o separador entre o identificador de esquema e quaisquer outros identificadores.

trans-unit.source: Generally, database servers indicate the schema for a identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente, os servidores de base de dados indicam o esquema para um identificador ao separar o nome do esquema do identificador com caráter de algumas.

trans-unit.source: For example, SQL Server uses a period, creating complete identifiers such as Person.CustomerName, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, SQL Server utiliza um período, a criação de identificadores de conclusão, tais como Person.CustomerName, onde "Pessoa" é o nome de esquema e "NomeDoCliente" é o identificador.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property lets developers modify this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade permite aos programadores alterar este comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The character to be used as the schema separator.
trans-unit.target: O carácter a ser utilizado como o separador de esquema.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador delimitado por aspas, devolve o formato correto unquoted esse identificador.

trans-unit.source: This includes correctly unescaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Isto inclui corretamente unescaping qualquer aspas no identificador de incorporados.

trans-unit.source: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
trans-unit.target: O identificador que terão as respetivas aspas incorporadas removidas.

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes properly unescaped.
trans-unit.target: O identificador unquoted, com aspas incorporados unescaped corretamente.
